title: In Blind Pick, don’t let players to lock in in the first 10 seconds.
body: Simple suggestion: In Blind Pick, don’t allow players to lock in their champions until 10 seconds have passed. This won’t completely stop players from just locking in whatever and ignoring their teammates, but at least it will help with players that “didn’t see it.”
